query:
INSERT INTO recharges (customerId, amount, paymentMethod, status, transactionId, createdAt, completedAt)
SELECT 
  customerId,
  amount,
  'pix' as paymentMethod,
  'completed' as status,
  txid as transactionId,
  createdAt,
  NOW() as completedAt
FROM pix_transactions
WHERE amount = 299 AND status = 'paid'
ORDER BY createdAt DESC
LIMIT 1;
